title: The Annals of the Terf Wars and Other Writing
description: The Annals of the Terf Wars brings together essays, speeches, Twitter threads, poetry, and one Star Wars inspired satirical play, written by the feminist philosopher Jane Clare Jones over the course of her many-year involvement in the gender wars. She is the director of The Centre for Feminist Thought, and the editor of the feminist journal The Radical Notion.
author: Jane Clare Jones
